resources.string: Your BMI calculation result is about:
Body mass index, also known as BMI index, is a standard commonly used in the world to measure the degree of obesity and health.
Please calculate first and then view the result~
Since your BMI is too thin, it is recommended that you read the following link:
From the BMI, your body is very healthy, continue to maintain
In view of your heavy BMI, we suggest you read the following link:
Oh, my God, your BMI is too heavy. Losing weight must be put on the agenda. The following link may help you
